Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light brown. Rectangular stamp with stars and piloi symbols.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '2̣9̣1'. Name Nikias. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR P.16291.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (201)
